attributes.action: Allow me to opt out of the £200 energy 'Loan'
attributes.additional_details: i feel we should have a choice and not have extra debt enforced up on us.
attributes.background: give the choice on whether to except or refuse the energy loan

rejection.details:
On 26 May, the Government announced that the energy bills discount due to be received by domestic energy customers in Great Britain from October is being doubled from £200 to £400, while the requirement to pay it back will be scrapped.

Read more: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/millions-of-most-vulnerable-households-will-receive-1200-of-help-with-cost-of-living
